output.description: Output file name. It uses JS template literal, so you can use `${config.name}` and other properties from Regolith config.

updateVersionFromTag.description: When true, update pack manifest versions to match the current git tag when the current commit is tagged.

worldFolder.description: The name of the world folder inside `minecraftWorlds` folder

worldPath.description: The path to the world folder

worldName.description: The name of the world. It uses JS template literal, so you can use `${config.name}` and other properties from Regolith config.

worldVersion.description: The world version to set. Not specifying the field will not do anything, setting to `null` will clear the version completely and setting to `release` will set the latest release
